flawed_nl_solution:
After the first month you get 10/100 * $300 = $<<10/100*300=3000/1>>3000/1 interest.
After the first month you will have $300 + $3000/1 = $<<300+3000/1=3300>>3300 in total.
After the second month you get = 10/100 * $3300 = $<<10/100*3300=330>>330 interest.
After the second month you will have $3300 + $330 = $<<3300+330=3630>>3630 in total.
#### 3630

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 3000/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
